thread.title: Carmelo Anthony saves Knicks from yet another collapse, drills game-winner
thread.title_full: Carmelo Anthony saves Knicks from yet another collapse, drills game-winner

title: Carmelo Anthony saves Knicks from yet another collapse, drills game-winner
text:
Carmelo Anthony saves Knicks from yet another collapse, drills game-winner Getty Images Feb 26, 2017 at 12:23a ET 0Shares 
At this point, it feels like once a week that weâ€™re either watching, reading, or learning about the New York Knicks blowing a late double-digit lead and collapsing like a house of cards with the game on the line. 
On Saturday night, the story was no different. Leading by 10 with less than four and a half minutes left in the game, the Knicks coughed up the advantage and ultimately found themselves down by a point, with only seconds remaining, after a Jahlil Okafor converted a turnaround jumper. 
But this night would end differently for New York and the loyal MSG fans, as Carmelo drilled a pull-up jump shot with the game on the line:
